website_summaries.verdict: This premium diet was baked with low heat, ensuring that fewer nutrients are cooked out of these floating crisps. An excellent choice for goldfish who have trouble finding sinking pellets.
pros: Fish meal is the first ingredient
Includes high-protein krill for stronger muscles
Crisps float for longer than flakes
cons: Since this formula tends to float on the surface for longer, goldfish known for sucking in large gulps of air should avoid it

customer_reviews.title: Turn your filters down a little while feeding.
customer_reviews.text: If you have large goldfish, these are wonderful! Mine are Fancies. One tank has larger fish with average bodies 6” or more (no fins). The other tank has smaller ones. 3” average. These crips work for both. I have tried to change to other pellet brands and they refuse to eat them. I have one with swim bladder disease that would always gulp to much air from flake food that floated on surface. Pellets sink to fast to bottom which she couldn’t always get to. This food takes its time sinking to the bottom giving her time to grab and eat. My fish recommend this food but they also recommend variety such as veggies and worms.
customer_reviews.author: Carene neibaur

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff kings!!!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Tetra for sticking it to us!! 3 months ago the price was16.00 now its 20.99. I’ve been using this product for 10 years. Now in light of a pandemic you can squeeze your customers...loyal customers who have purchased from you for 10 years! Thank you so much ... jerks! May it come back to you 10 fold!
customer_reviews.author: EAV

customer_reviews.title: Less cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this fish food for my large fish tank at my office. I normally use flake food, but decided to splurge on this. My eclipse brand aquarium doesn't have the greatest filtration and my gold fish were making it difficult to keep my tank clean. I purchased this food and started using it and it seems to keep my tank much cleaner. I don't have to clean my filters as much, and my fish seems to enjoy eating it. Overall I'm happy with my purchase and I'd recommend this food to anyone with goldfish.
customer_reviews.author: TJinSB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We used to use flakes for the fish food automatic feeder on our aquarium and always had to try to crush them up a bit to make sure they didn't plug the dispenser opening. No such problem with these crisps as they are very uniform and makes it easy to set the automatic feeder at the desired rate of feed. Definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Crisps
customer_reviews.text: The crisps are firmer and smaller than flakes and therefore work much better in my automatic feeder. They used to come in a larger size than was a more economical purchase. My goldfish (very old) seem to like them very much. They don't really care for pellets and the flakes don't work well in the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie's Mum

customer_reviews.title: Fish Like Them
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish aren't picky, and will eat most anything. They seem to like these just fine, and get excited when it was feeding time. Doesn't seem to hurt them, and I can't say if they have better colour, since one's white and one's plain orange. But no harm done it seems, so I'd recommend the crisps.
customer_reviews.author: S Martin

customer_reviews.title: My goldfish Gubbles is addicted to these
customer_reviews.text: He may have a problem, but until they open up a rehab center for goldfish I will continue to provide him with these addictive, yet nutritious crisps. Basically every time he sees me with the bottle in my hands, he twitches until I sprinkle them in to his habitat.
customer_reviews.author: Livid J...

customer_reviews.title: The "crisp" (vs flake food) is the way to go.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice large size I used to refill my smaller container to feed my extremely large gold fish that I have going on 20 years now. I prefer the "crisp" as it keeps my water cleaner longer in my opinion, it is not as messy and easy to measure.
customer_reviews.author: Mt Tom Photo

customer_reviews.title: My Fish Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large goldfish and he loves it. This appears to be a newer formula. The crisps sink a bit faster to the bottom which keeps the fish occupied and reduces the chance they get sucked into the filter.
customer_reviews.author: savenergy

customer_reviews.title: Our fish love this food
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this food for so long that I can't remember when we didn't. It's the first food that our pond fish enjoy enough to eat. We tried flakes and pellets and they weren't a hit. This crisps are what they like. It's more expensive than other food but if they will eat it it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: If I were a Goldfish, this is what I would want to eat
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fish food that I love to feed the goldfish in my pond. Small enough that the goldfish will eat it without any problem. Just feed them enough so there are no leftovers and none to cloudy the water after. I prefer the crisps style to the pellets, it could be flavor but the goldfish don't always eat all the pellets I gave them before, and they would eventually disintegrate in the water and make the water dirty. No issue with these crisps
customer_reviews.author: Flying Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Fish love this
customer_reviews.text: My smaller pond fish eat this because they cannot handle the bigger pellets that I feed to the bigger fish. It does not leave a mess in the pond. I'm glad I have this to feed to them.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Fish eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Color enhancer is gone. Was it bad for the fish? I don't know. Other than that, seems the same.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K.

customer_reviews.title: Makes water cloudy
customer_reviews.text: These really make your water look very dirty very quickly. We had to clean our tank at least twice as often when using these.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: bad fishfood, turns my water white
customer_reviews.text: bad fishfood , turns my water white , it has ruined my water several times. i need to change the water twice a week wich is bad for fish .
customer_reviews.author: Karina martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent food
customer_reviews.text: I have 22 goldfish in an outdoor pond, and the fish and I are very satisfied with the Goldfish Crisps. Much better than ordinary flakes. I am on my third 7.9 oz container.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Halter

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the cheap grocery store food I been buying. I had been having trouble keeping fish alive. Now not only are all of my new Orandas still alive but they are thriving and growing with bright color.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Swett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't cloud the water
customer_reviews.text: All the fish in the tank love this food. No cloudy water or food sitting on the bottom of the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: They love the crisps over the flakes and it keeps the water cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: kathi harmon

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Goldfish!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide variety of fish in a community tank. I started using this when I only had Goldfish but now I just have one fancy goldfish (years and years later) and an Elephant Nose, Barb, Betta, Pleco, Pictus Catfish, Knife fish, dwarf frogs, etc..I use this as their main food with a few treats a couple of times a week (shrimp, tubifix worms etc). They all are beautiful and healthy and my tank looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Happy Fish
customer_reviews.text: Regular quality our fish is used to, and very fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fish love them
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish love these. They float for a minute and then drift to the bottom. They don't dissolve right away so they aren't too bad on the filter.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Mcglone

customer_reviews.title: Fish love it
customer_reviews.text: Same as in the pet store, but delivered to my door.
customer_reviews.author: MS Diver

customer_reviews.title: This is all my picky fish will eat.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I spoiled them, but they like this food. They will not eat the pellets. This does not cloud the water either.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Good food for my Goldfish
customer_reviews.text: I use this regularly for my pet Goldfish,.....they are fancy goldfish and they love these crisps.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It's goldfish food
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tasted it, but it stinks like dead shrimp. Fish eat it.
customer_reviews.author: jlk

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this food when we bought our goldfish, this is such a savings purchasing larger size. Goldfish thriving & love this food.
customer_reviews.author: lin1616

customer_reviews.title: Not good for water
customer_reviews.text: This food gets the water extremely filthy extremely fast!! Had to change water every 3-4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Would buy this and I won’t go back to flake food
customer_reviews.text: All of my fish love these crisps. I like them because they don’t sink to the bottom of the tank fast which give the fish time to eat it
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA NEALIOUS-BOYCE

customer_reviews.title: always fast and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have very large gold fish who grew from feeder fish. This is the best I can give them
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: TetraPro Goldfish Crisps
customer_reviews.text: Great product for small fish. Even the large koi love it. Seller delivered in good condition and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M DeVillier

customer_reviews.title: Crisps are winners
customer_reviews.text: Both the large goldfish in my pond, and the much smaller mosquito-eater fish, love these. These are much less wasteful then the flakes, which I never purchase anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, would recommend. Nice combination of stars and moons and colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A.

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: Love this food. Easier to feed to fish then flakes. And a lot less messy. Doesn't Cloud the water. I actually feed my fish one sixteenth of an inch round pellets. I give them this as a treat in between feedings.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand and Great for the fish
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the food and so are my fish. The don't make the water cloudy like some flimsy flake food do. They hold their shape in the water. Will be buying Goldfish Crisps instead of flakes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Mc

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the lid?
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered with product lid missing. Container was in perfect condition. Foil seal was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fish love this!
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish love this, and it is very difficult to find it in pet stores!
customer_reviews.author: Karen E.

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping waste down
customer_reviews.text: Great at keeping waste down. No need to feed fish daily, every other day or every 2 days works best for healthy fish
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Don't love the price, but it's almost worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Much less waste = MUCH cleaner water for longer. Almost worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: LHP5150

customer_reviews.title: Fish love it!
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish LOVE this stuff. I’ve never seen them go after any other food quite this way. Feeding time has become so much fun! Also, it doesn’t seem to leave any sort of residue which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Nice fish food.
customer_reviews.text: My fish loves these little “crisps”. Seems less cloudy than traditional flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Watts

customer_reviews.title: My koi love these
customer_reviews.text: My koi and baby koi love this stuff wishing they made in bigger bags
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Best fish food ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fish food that I have used. It usually is diffult to get, so I was happy to find it. The fish swarm to eat it and the tank keeps cleaner! Also it actually smells like seafood.
customer_reviews.author: sandra johnston

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it is an improvement over the flakes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lally

customer_reviews.title: My Koi love this
customer_reviews.text: Good food for Koi. As my Koi have grown, they still prefer this food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plus my goldfish love this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is freaking huge!! Definitely save more when buying on here rather than in stores. Plus my goldfish love this brand
customer_reviews.author: Liah05Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: As expected, good service, right product
customer_reviews.text: I'm buying it online because local Pet Club no longer stocks larger size. I use it for my goldfish, of course!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Herringshaw

customer_reviews.title: Crisps Fish Food
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fish Food. Crisps float on the water surface. Do not fall to the bottom of the tank. This keeps the aquarium clean. Crisps stay afloat so the fish have to get them.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered goldfish crisps,received tropical crisps and it arrived with no screw on cap. Only one item ordered and couldn't get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Poison
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same goldfish for almost a year and within a few days of switching to this food 4 of them died.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fish love it
customer_reviews.text: Our fish are fat and happy. It must taste good to them
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It's the only kind they really like.
customer_reviews.text: The 4 gold fish I have all are smiling and wagging their tails when they see me coming with the crisps. It's the only kind they really like.
customer_reviews.author: dhock

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: my 3 fish loves this food will not eat any other kind,highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yann paquet

customer_reviews.title: My fish love this food
customer_reviews.text: My fish love this food. I'ts great for fancies and common/comets, alike. I almost didn't give it a 5 because it used to make the water red. To be fair, it hasn't recently..so maybe they changed the formula.
customer_reviews.author: AkrBn

customer_reviews.title: Good 2 month supply
customer_reviews.text: My fish eats and seems to enjoy the good. Then again it's a goldfish. What do they not eat? Ha ha
customer_reviews.author: IsauraZ

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: The fish love them, they take longer to sink and they clean them up before they hit the gravel so helps keep it cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Tiny can, looked like 6.0
customer_reviews.text: It is not even an ounce. I usually buy 7.9 Oz cans not .60 Oz. I can feed one fish with that.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: fish food
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish are in a large pond outside, they love these fish crisps.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Elder

customer_reviews.title: best goldfish food there is
customer_reviews.text: Best goldfish food there is on the market dont get the cheap ive had my fish for a couple years and this does seem like the best one out there
customer_reviews.author: Bnavveer

customer_reviews.title: Shipped fast and safely.
customer_reviews.text: A good price for a product that I have bought for years from a Big Box Store.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara LaChine

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: The Product was everything I expected. My fish are happy and healthy. Join Amazon prime, I use it all the time and have saved a lot of money over the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Kbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great the Fish Enjoy this and the Crisps float along time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My goldfish love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are my goldfish's favorite food between the flakes and the pellets and the crisps, although I do vary their food still.
customer_reviews.author: Wenderella

customer_reviews.title: Tetra
customer_reviews.text: My fish love this stuff, great all the way around including no mess in the water, a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Pen

customer_reviews.title: Fish able to eat
customer_reviews.text: Fish like it and does not cloud water like flakes that turn into mush in water.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wildrick

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I always am very happy buying this my fish love it
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it's pretty standard fish food and does the trick
customer_reviews.text: I wish the top was different so that it was easier to pour a small amount at a time. Otherwise it's pretty standard fish food and does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: MissMiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My goldfish love this food! And it keeps the water clean.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Howard

customer_reviews.title: I use Goldfish Crisp because it does not cloud the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use Goldfish Crisp because it does not cloud the tank water. The item was delivered on time as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Best thing between flake and pellet food
customer_reviews.text: Best thing between flake and pellet food, doesn't melt right away and softens quicker so fish can eat unlike every pellet I've tried. Also if pre soaked for 20 sec it will slowly sink which is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Tim Willey

customer_reviews.title: This is a good big pack
customer_reviews.text: This is a good big pack, I think this should last for more than 6 months for my 5 gold fishes. They love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water stays clear.
customer_reviews.text: Goldfish enjoy the crisps. Less waste and water stays clean longer.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Personal fish food favorite.
customer_reviews.text: So hard to find these anymore and I love these. My one fish only eats truly well when these are added to the tank. He's picky, I tell you.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: No lid
customer_reviews.text: It came used with no lid on it! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty goldfish disks in a nice sized container.
customer_reviews.text: My son's goldfish love these food disks, because they really gobble them up. He gives them as a treat, in addition to the goldfish food. They are little colored disks. He must be doing something right because these goldfish are huge -- pan size..... (shhhh. Don't tell the fish I said that.)
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W

customer_reviews.title: Orange Tank Water
customer_reviews.text: Spent the extra money and bought these based on some reviewers' recommendations. TetraFin would turn my tank water orange. Unfortunately, TetratPro costs more and turns my water orange also.
customer_reviews.author: fixit

product_meta.title: Tetra 77074 TetraPRO Goldfish Crisps for Fishes
product_meta.description: Size:7.90oz (224 g)TetraPro Goldfish Crisps provide advanced nutrition for the discerning fish-keeper. This nutritionally balanced diet feeds cleaner than ordinary flakes and leaves less waste in the aquarium. Each goldfish crisp is made using an exclusive low-heat process which preserves essential vitamins for a healthier, more nutritious diet. TetraPro Goldfish Crisps float longer to allow fish more time to eat and are precision crafted with Biotin to support fish immune system health.
feature_bullets: Advanced nutrition for the discerning fish-keeper
Feeds cleaner than ordinary flakes for less waste
Made using an exclusive low-heat process which preserves essential vitamins
Supports fish's immune system with Biotin
